title: Evaluation and Application Process for Cloud-Based Collaborative Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and digital tool proficiency, team project experience
context.additional_context: Development of collaborative and analytical skills using cloud tools in a science curriculum-linked project-based assessment environment

learning_goals: Learners enhance analytical skills by planning and executing science projects using cloud-based collaboration tools.
Learners evaluate the six menus of the 3CR application, mastering how to apply usability, functionality, visual communication, instructional design, and security criteria.
Learners develop the competency to collaborate with team members in organizing ideas into visual materials (bubble diagrams, text outlines) and co-documenting.
Learners explain how to measure the quality of digital learning tools by understanding the MFRM (Many-Facet Rasch Model)-based assessment framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
